cyclone.name: LAURA
cyclone.current_location: about 50 miles N of the western tip of Cuba
cyclone.trajectory: tracking west-northwest across the Gulf of Mexico toward the Texas–Louisiana coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: near the Texas–Louisiana border (between Port Bolivar TX and Morgan City LA)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm-surge watch San Luis Pass TX to Ocean Springs MS; hurricane watch Port Bolivar TX to west of Morgan City LA; tropical-storm watch south of Port Bolivar to San Luis Pass TX and Morgan City LA to Mouth of the Mississippi River
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical-storm warning Cuban provinces listed and lower FL Keys from Seven-Mile Bridge to Key West/Dry Tortugas
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Central and north-western Gulf Coast (TX–LA–MS) and portions of western Cuba and the lower Florida Keys
weather_observation.wind: Peripheral gusty winds below tropical-storm force possible; strongest core remains well west of PortMiami.
weather_observation.storm_surge: None expected along the southeast Florida Atlantic coast.
weather_observation.rainfall: Occasional outer rainbands may bring brief showers, but heavy accumulations are not expected.
weather_observation.other_hazards: High surf and dangerous rip currents along Atlantic beaches.
